titleInfo.title: Mass in Honor of St. Benilde

mods.abstract: Brother Luke M. Grande and Msgr. Merlin Kerney honored the newly canonized St. Benilde in a mass held at the Cathedral of the Immaculate Conception in Memphis, Tennessee. St. Benilde was the first of the De LaSalle Christian Brothers to be canonized.
